@mr_voltare, it only has Dutch subtitles, and English audio. If you want to add English subtitles you have to edit the dvd with a editor that can handle .srt of .sub files. You also need to find a English sub. Google for: "Add subtitles to dvd".

Om dit te branden kan je het beste ConvertXtoDVD 4 gebruiken, dit programma brand het en plaatst de ondertiteling er automatisch bij.( je moet wel alle bestanden in de map van harry potter aanklikken, dan zet ie het om en dan brand ie het) succes!

@Libaguy
To enable an srt file (sub file) simply name the file the same way as the video file is named

Harry Potter And The Deathly Hollows.mkv/mp4...
Harry Potter And The Deathly Hollows.srt
if you wanna play it without unpacking or other shit, just download the videoland VLC player. then rightclick on ur .iso file and choose play with VLC player. and there you go!!!
